meanings.definition: In a manner showing reverence or adoration.
meanings.sent1: She looked worshipfully at the beautiful painting in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The crowd clapped worshipfully as the famous singer took the stage.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail worshipfully at its owner, hoping for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood worshipfully in the center of the forest, its branches reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The child gazed worshipfully at the stars, marveling at their beauty.

meanings.sent1: He spoke worshipfully of his favorite teacher, praising her kindness.
meanings.sent2: The students listened worshipfully to the wise words of the elder.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred worshipfully as its owner scratched behind its ears.
meanings.sent4: The athlete trained worshipfully, determined to achieve success in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted worshipfully, pouring his heart into each brushstroke.
